description.$invariant: If you own an automated garage door, you probably use your garage door remote control every day. Our garage door remote controls are incredibly reliable to use and now feature the latest in advanced encryption technology to protect you from code grabbing devices that can intercept some remote control signals. We call this technology Trio-Code 128™ and it is used on our latest generation of remote controls including PTX-5. The great news is that our Trio-Code 128 remote controls are backwards compatible. That means that you can use the latest technology remote controls even on your existing Automatic Technology opener (made from 2008 onwards).
